course_title: Fresh Sem: Poli Sci: Intl. Dim. of Civil Conflict
class_notes: The course is also designed to encourage further development of analytical tools for critical evaluation and to enhance communication skills so that you can effectively express your knowledge, views, and ideas.  To this end, class discussion, collaborative analysis, and simulations are prominent features of the course.  Student engagement and participation are essential.  I treat you as active partners in shaping our class environment and the quality of your experience is influenced significantly by your input.
course_description: For first-year students only. Entry level seminar focusing on a specific topic. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
